    About Me

    Welcome! I am a Master’s student in Data Science at UC San Diego, passionate about leveraging data and AI to solve complex, real-world problems. With a focus on innovation and practical applications, I aim to contribute to cutting-edge advancements in AI-driven solutions.

    Currently, I am an AI Specialist at UC San Diego Business & Financial Services (BFS), where I utilize GenAI tools like TritonGPT to streamline workflows, enhance user experiences, and improve data accessibility. This role has further sparked my interest in AI-driven automation and optimization, and I am continuously exploring ways to optimize internal systems and solve complex problems with AI.

    What I’m Looking For

    I am actively seeking opportunities to join a Research lab where I can apply my academic and practical knowledge to explore advanced machine learning techniques, data science, and AI applications in real-world contexts. I am eager to contribute to impactful research in AI and machine learning, particularly in areas like natural language processing, computer vision, and optimization.

    Additionally, I am looking for Summer Internships in the Data Science and AI/ML space. I want to contribute to industry-driven projects, develop new skills, and work alongside experts to solve critical problems using AI and machine learning technologies.
